Description:
Peace And Tranquillity On Almost 1/2 An Acre!
Perfectly positioned in a peaceful no through road is this beautiful elevated residence that is set on a landscaped allotment of almost half an acre benefitting from a lovely outlook. The stunning family home will cater for the largest family and has been designed so that it can be used for an extended family or a work from home situation as there are two distinct areas with their own entrances. Offering 3 spacious living areas that include a lounge room with a crackling solid fuel fire as a centrepiece, a big meals/family area and a separate rumpus room. The modern French provincial style kitchen is in the heart of the home and offers stainless steel appliances including a dishwasher and plenty of cupboards and bench space. Boasting designer style, light filled living rooms and soaring ceilings the theme throughout is one of total luxury, style and flair. There are 5 generously sized bedrooms all with built in robes and 2 modern bathrooms. Split system heating and cooling, ceiling fans and ducted heating provide year round comfort. The whole property has been thoughtfully landscaped to cater for kids, pets and entertaining and offers large lawn area, mature established gardens with the perfect mix of flowering ornamentals and natives. Also on offer is a large paved entertaining area that makes the most of a picturesque outlook and is an ideal place to entertain friends and family. A sealed driveway, garden shed, under-house storage and solar panels completes an ideal property. Located within easy reach of everything that the beautiful town of Emerald has to offer and yet privately situated to enjoy the tranquillity that surrounds you, you can make the most of the relaxed lifestyle you crave.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.
Insights: 26 Poplar Crescent, Emerald VIC 3782 was last sold in 2019 and 9 other 5 bedroom house in Emerald have recently been sold.

Description:
Deceased Estate - Ready to be Renewed and Reloved
Built in 1973 this solid brick home on acre (approx.) was thoughtfully designed to see it through the passage of time. It has been well loved and well cared for and now is its time to be reborn with the love of a new family. It sits in peace and seclusion in a tightly held pocket, right next to Emerald Lake Park and opposite Puffing Billy track. There is a horseshoe drive with ample room for cars including carports for 3.
The house is clearly in need of an update but there is nothing but personal taste to stop a family living here immediately. The bones of this house are strong. The open plan kitchen/informal meals area is prescient of modern taste and with the sink perfectly positioned beneath a large garden window, doing dishes here will never be a chore.
Potential is a word never far from your mind as you note the original features in the study, large family bathroom and spacious laundry. The formal dining room adjoins the lounge, both are a good size and filled with light and greenery courtesy of the enormous full length triple windows on 3 walls. For comfort there is a fully functioning fireplace and both gas ducted heating and evaporative cooling. The 3 bedrooms include a small double with BIR. A full sized double looking out into the lush mature gardens. The master suite has everything you need apart from a modern aesthetic. It features a door leading to the private fern garden, a large walk in wardrobe and a full ensuite.
Don't forget to bring a tape measure and colour palette to the open for inspection.

Description:
Your Own Paradise On 10 Acres - Retreat to Nature !
*VEER RIGHT FROM GREY RD INTO MENTIPLAY RD GEMBROOK*
This private 10.7 acres in Gembrook is just perfect for those who would love to own their own piece of paradise!
With a sunny north facing aspect, 6+ acres is stunning natural bush and there is approximately 2+ acres of cleared pasture.
Situated at the top of the property is a self-sufficient, eco-friendly studio retreat that has been cleverly set up to allow you to live off the grid in harmony with nature.
This light filled 4 square home has all the comforts including timber floors, cosy wood fire heater, double glazed windows, roomy kitchen, well-appointed bathroom and instantaneous hot water system. The self sufficiency of this home is assured with a 2.5kw solar system with battery storage and a 5.0kVA generator as backup, a self-maintaining treatment worm farm septic system and a water tank with 39,000 holding capacity. Included in the sale is the 12v fridge, 5kVA generator and the lounge room furniture.
There are two large sliding doors that open up this home onto the large north facing deck where you can relax and enjoy the magnificent outlook of towering gums, soft tree ferns, native bird life and wildlife. Revel in the tranquility of this property far from the hustle and bustle or take a walk through native bushland to the spring fed lagoon and delight in seeing the best in our flora and fauna including Lyrebirds, Echidnas, Wallabies and Wombats.
Also included is a vege patch, fenced dog/chook run and the whole property is fenced with ringlock wire.
If it is just the land you seek please call to inquire or even better live in the studio while you plan & build your dream home (STCA).
Whether youre looking for a weekender, retreat or unrivaled opportunity to secure an affordable acreage property, you need to arrange an inspection now!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office

Description:
Family Living in the Dress Circle of Emerald
Privately set on just over a 1/2 acre, and located in the much sought after Dress Circle area of Emerald is this well presented character filled home enjoying both a northerly aspect, as well as a great backdrop of the Warburton Ranges. The home flows over three levels and ideally suited to a growing family, with the upper level offering a spacious rumpus room, and two light filled bedrooms, both with built in robes, and magnificent vistas of the property and the distant ranges. The lower level is the hub of the home and consists of a formal lounge with built in solid fuel heater and expansive windows, allowing spectacular views over the rear gardens and beyond. The kitchen is also light filled and features a 900mm cooker, good storage cupboards and adjoins the meals area. The master and ensuite are privately set on the middle level and are located to one end of the home and the fourth bedroom and study nook are located at the other end. Extras include parquetry timber floors, ducted heating, and plenty of storage. Step outside to very private outdoor entertaining , lawn area, and a park-like setting with a wonderful mix of fruit trees, mature deciduous trees, rhododendron, garden shed, ample space for parking, and there is also an abundance of birds and wildlife. This magnificent property offers a wonderful lifestyle with ample space for the family to enjoy.

Description:
Immaculately Presented Entertainer!!
Sitting peacefully overlooking the beautiful lawns of Nobelius Heritage Park and with Puffing Billy chugging past your door, this stunning home is certainly something very special. You will be impressed with the open plan living featuring a stunning kitchen with Caesar stone island bench, Bosch appliances including dishwasher and plenty of storage space. There are 3 spacious bedrooms all with built in robes plus a fantastic home office / media room which acts as the ideal second living space. Updated only recently, the main bathroom is simply stunning with its luxurious oversized shower and skylight to let the natural light filter in. Gas ducted heating and two split systems have been installed to ensure your comfort all year round while outside, the huge undercover outdoor entertaining area is perfect for the upcoming summer nights ahead and adjoins the double remote garage with workshop area that comes complete with mezzanine storage. Take a walk around Emerald Lake Park that is right at your doorstep or wander into Emerald township for your Sunday morning coffee at one of the many gorgeous cafes and eateries. The choice is yours. Set amongst established landscaped gardens with a long sealed driveway, this property is simply perfect.
Located in a quiet, leafy street within walking distance of everything that Emerald has to offer, this stylish, modern home boasts something special that is often hard to find.
Please note: All property details shown are correct at time of publishing. Some properties may have been sold in the preceding 24 hours and we recommend that you confirm open for inspection times with the listing agent direct or the listing office.

Description:
Two beautiful homes on one 2875m2 block
MAIN HOME
A chic abode surrounded by nature; the three bedroom home is enfolded by an inviting veranda. Morning sun pours through the kitchen bay window over the stylish stone counter-top. This large open plan living area is centred around a welcoming wood fire where you can relax while watching the local bird life or step out under the ferns and enjoy a spa.
To the rear of the house you will find two bedrooms with BIR and a spacious family bathroom impeccably designed with claw-foot bath and large shower. Passing through the playroom/study/dressing room/parents retreat you enter the private master bedroom, featuring an up-to-date ensuite. The glass french doors open out to a separate fenced garden. This home offers all the creature comforts with numerous split systems and ducted heating.
STORYBOOK COTTAGE
The second dwelling has cosiness at its heart with a roaring gas log-fire and cathedral ceilings. The excellently proportioned kitchen and bathroom are designed to maximise space without compromising on comfort. Enjoy breakfast on the private balcony with the talkative kookaburras. Completely standalone with its own carport, this sturdy house would suit family or possibly airbnb guests.
The lovely fully fenced garden blossoms to life in spring and includes a newly established garden of 300 native plants. The block has two access points and includes a double garage and a flat area for a boat, plus ample room under both buildings for either workshops or storage.
All this at only 17 minutes to the freeway...better get a move on!

Description:
LIFESTYLE PROPERTY ON 2.2 ACRES APPROX.
Located in one of Emeralds most sought after locations and surrounded by magnificent established gardens, is this superb lifestyle property, offering absolute peace, privacy as well as the opportunity to work from home.
With magnificent garden aspects from all angles, the home offers a very versatile floor plan and is ideally suited to a growing family. There are four spacious bedrooms, family bathroom, big laundry, a central living area and dining area with a feature solid fuel heater and a light and bright family kitchen with Miele appliances which overlooks the meals area and opens out to the outdoor entertaining.
Extra features include high ceilings, cedar sash windows, ducted heating, magnificent spotted gum flooring, and wide eaves. Outside there is plenty of room for vehicles with double lock up garage incl. a fully lined utility room, a huge four car garage, single carport and an additional work room, ideally suited to a buyer looking to work with flowers, cut in abundance from the property. Assorted fruit trees, a selection of berries, veggie garden, additional tank water, chook pen and a huge variety of colourful Proteas will allow you to experience this ultimate lifestyle property and enjoy a superb combination of space, privacy and magnificent vistas in a premier location!
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead!

Description:
A Rare Gem In Emerald!
Rarely do you see a unit of this quality for sale in the popular Chestnut Gardens over 55s complex in Emerald.
This solid brick 2 bedroom unit is perfectly located, just a stroll to the heart of Emerald with its shops, cafes and public transport. Stylishly renovated, there is absolutely nothing to do but move in and enjoy this comfortable home. The home's 2 bedrooms are large and light filled & both have built in robes & plush carpets.
The well-appointed kitchen has quality appliances, plenty of cupboards & overlooks the living room with a dining area. New floors coverings, neutral tones, plantation shutters and tailored drapes feature in this living area which also has a glass sliding door opening onto the sunny north facing paved courtyard.
Totally fenced, you can enjoy this area with your furry friend. Included is a garden bed where you can grow your vegies or favourite plants. The home has mains gas heating & a split system for comfort all year round, security entrance door, single lock up garage with remote control & internal access as well as easy to maintain landscaping.
This beautiful home would suit retiree downsizers or investors & will not last long!
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
YOUR KEY TO LIFESTYLE LIVING
A lovely unit located in the heart of Gembrook, walking distance to the quaint town filled with thriving cafes, restaurants, shops, picturesque parks and the iconic Puffing Billy station. This tidy low maintenance unit is ready for someone to call home. With 2 generously sized bedrooms both with built in robes, spacious central bathroom, open plan kitchen, equipped with plenty of cupboards, bench space and dishwasher allowing the chef of the home to create a feast. Living and dining features sliding door access to the low maintenance outdoor courtyard, perfect for indoor/outdoor entertaining. Your comfort is assured with gas ducted heating, split system, internal access from the remote single car garage providing all weather access and plenty of outdoor parking space to fit a second car in your very own sealed driveway, in addition to this there is plenty of parking space for visitors. This lovely unit is ready for you to walk in, unpack your bags and enjoy all that lifestyle living has to offer.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
LIGHT, BRIGHT AND SPACIOUS ON OVER 1200m2
High set to take in the beauty that surrounds, this one owner home oozes charm and character and offers all of the space you and your family need for relaxed living. Cathedral ceilings, extensive use of timber including polished hardwood floors and huge windows add to the beauty of the home and give a sense of space and light. Entertaining will be a breeze whatever the weather with a huge separate living area that will accommodate the largest table, give you room for a billiard table or make a great place for family get-togethers. The lounge room is a tranquil place to settle back and read a book whilst the kitchen is the hub of the home with gas hotplates, wall oven, plenty of cupboards and a meals area adjoining. Doors lead out from the living rooms to the wrap around verandah where a covered alfresco area will make the ideal place for outdoor entertaining as you take in the sights and sounds of nature. There are four bedrooms and two State of the Art bathrooms, the family bathroom has a freestanding bath as a centrepiece. A new ducted heating system and 3 split systems provide year round comfort. Outdoors you can make the most of the landscaped gardens, grassed areas and a double garage to house your vehicles. For those that love to bushwalk, the Telopea steps at the bottom of the road will take you along the Menzies Creek and as far as Kallista. Situated in a prized location within easy reach of the shopping centre and a short drive to major arterial roads, this is a property that will delight you.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Too Good to Miss Out On, 1400m2 and Garages.
**** OFFERS CLOSING TUESDAY 29TH OCTOBER AT 5.00PM****
Dont take too long to check out this fantastic 3 bedroom, 1 bathroom, brick veneer with 2 garages, shedding and a workshop under the house. Youll be treated to new carpet throughout, new window furnishings, light fittings and a really neat and tidy home that youll easily put your own stamp on. On the ever popular spot just off Wellington Road in Clematis you have easy access to Emerald Township, bus connections to Belgrave for CBD rail network, quick road links to M1 and Eastlink, the fabulous Fountain Gate Shopping and dining precinct 20 minutes away, what a great location. You can even walk up to the newly renovated iconic Paradise Hotel for a cheeky Sunday bevvy and give a wave to the people chugging past on Puffing Billy. The property also features, ducted heated, split system, a front porch, return driveway, paved outdoor area partially covered, elevated gardens and plenty of room to move.
If youd like to chat more about this home or to make an appointment Mick Dolphin 0429 684 522, Janet Hawkins 0409 117 432 and Amy Fairway 0409 336 420.

Description:
'Parkes' - A Private Haven!
You will fall in love with Parkes a beautiful home privately nestled on 3/4 acre at the end of a no through road. The sealed drive of this home is lined with blossoming rose bushes and a green lush hedge which contrasts nicely against the white picket fence.
Upon entry you get a sense of space and comfort in this immaculately presented home with its soaring cathedral ceilings, neutral tones and polished floor finishes. The open plan family room features a cosy wood fire heater and connects seamlessly to the contemporary kitchen with its white cabinetry, dishwasher and generous bench space where the chef in the family can create wonderful meals for friends and family. Glass stacker doors opens the dining area to the outdoor covered deck where entertaining is made easy all year round with the inclusion of café blinds.
There are three large robed bedrooms as well as a unique loft which is perfect as an additional bedroom, study or private retreat.
Outside the features continue with amazing park like gardens offering a true haven. Stroll along the pathways past flowering shrubs and roses to take in the beauty of this property. A white wisteria draped over an arbour invites you to the private seating area around a fire pit, the perfect place for friends to gather and enjoy an evening get together. Another rose and hedge lined pathway lead you to Bali inspired hut where you can recline on the day bed and listen to the sounds of the natural creek running through the tree fern gully. Included is also a studio with power which is perfect for the budding artist, She Shed or kids retreat.
The features continue with 2 kw solar power, fully fenced for the safety of kids and pets, single carport, under house storage space and a relaxing spa on the rear deck.
Superbly located in a private pocket a stone's throw from Wellington road and public transport and conveniently close to Emerald township, Menzies Creek, schools and restaurants.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
PEACE, PRIVACY AND BEAUTY EVERYWHERE ON 9644m2
At the end of a long day you will feel yourself unwind as you arrive home to your private country property where the sights and sounds of nature are your only distraction. Over 2.3 acres of lush pasture and leafy established gardens surrounds a beautifully presented home that offers the latest in modern style combined with classic country charm. Soaring ceilings and huge picture windows provide an atmosphere of space and sun soaked beauty whilst stunning décor creates a home that is a joy to live in. With a tranquil outlook to the natural wonderland that borders the property you can delight in the abundance of native birdlife that are regular visitors as you relax with a glass of the best in the living room or on the balcony. The State of the Art kitchen has loads of storage, gas hot plates, dishwasher, glass splashback and Caesarstone waterfall island bench. There is a cosy meals/family area adjoining the kitchen. The living room has a wood fire as a centrepiece and is the perfect place to make the most of the views on offer. With zoned bedrooms the whole family can have their own space; the master suite is serviced by a dressing room with robes and full ensuite and has access to the fourth bedroom which would make a great nursery, parents retreat or study. The other bedrooms have built in robes and are serviced by the family bathroom. Ducted heating, ceiling fans and split system ensure climate control whatever the weather. Outdoors the scene is set for country living at its best with oversized double carport, double garage, under house storage, stables, chicken pen, raised veggie garden, fruit trees, and three paddocks for your four legged friends. At the rear boundary is the Menzies Creek and a nature trail that goes for kilometres for those that love to bushwalk. This is a property that will delight at every angle. A place of artistic inspiration and serenity, make your move to a better way of living today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Spacious & Comfortable Dual Accommodation Under Roof-line Surrounded by Nature!
If you've ever wanted to get away from it all and live immersed with nature you will fall in love with this property, a truly rare opportunity to reside surrounded by the stunning Bunyip State Forest. Set on just over 18 acres, you have the perfect blend of open land and natural bush.
The long country driveway, lined with birch trees and lush tree ferns, takes you up to the spacious country style home. Featuring 5 bedrooms all with built in robes, the generously sized Master has a large walk through robe to the ensuite, and huge bay windows taking in stunning views to Western Port Bay and French Island.
The large Blackwood timber kitchen has near new quality appliances including 900ml gas cooktop and oven, gas fridge and ample cupboard space, which flows into 2 large living areas with high ceilings and beautiful slate flooring. The home is heated by a cosy slow combustion wood heater ensuring year round warmth.
Attached to the main residence is a brilliant self-contained 1 bedroom flat with its own access; ideal for guests and family seeking the dual accommodation aspect.
Take in the serenity of this magnificent location relaxing under the large covered patio with views of the landscaped gardens. With a 9 X 6 metre 3 car garage and various shedding, storage for all your tools, equipment and machinery will be covered. Secure paddocks and yards currently allow the resident goats, chickens, geese and dog to roam safely and happily in their own spaces with plenty of space for more pets. Let Mother Nature pay your bills as the home is powered by impressive 2.2 KW Solar Panels with battery storage, 2 generators, gas hot water with solar hot water available once connected, Telstra Smart Antenna for optimum reception, satellite dish for internet ready for connection and plenty of tank water. If serenity, views and self-sustainability are on the top of your list then look no further.
** To travel to 70 Currawong Drive Gembrook, we recommend you use The Pack Track (off Gembrook-Launching Place Road) and then turn left onto Beenak East Road. Drive for approximately 7.5km to reach Currawong Drive.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Samantha Scott 0438 680 032

Description:
1149m2 of Exceptional Family Living In Central Gembrook
Perfectly located in one of Gembrooks finest positions is this meticulously maintained and beautifully presented character weatherboard home that needs to be seen to be truly appreciated. The home has been carefully planned to ensure the whole family has their own space to enjoy and offers multiple spacious living areas including a large open plan dining and family room and fully equipped home theatre room. There are 4 bedrooms, the master complete with a walk-in robe and a stylish ensuite with double shower and modern tones. The second and third bedrooms have built in robes and the 4th bedroom is currently used as a study and could also serve as another living space depending on your requirements. The spacious modern kitchen is located in the heart of the home and comes complete with a stainless steel Smeg 900mm freestanding oven, island bench, loads of cupboards and bench space, dishwasher and servery window that makes entertaining a breeze.
Special features include polished hardwood floors, gas ducted heating, 10kw split system heating and cooling, solid fuel fire, ceiling fans and double-glazed windows. There is plenty to enjoy outside with a completely usable allotment of 1149m2 that offers a fantastic decked alfresco area complete with café blinds, manicured established gardens, large lawn areas, storage shed, sealed driveway, double remote garage and additional parking. This is the ultimate package combining modern living and a low maintenance lifestyle. All situated within walking distance of Puffing Billy station, a variety of renowned eateries, kindergarten, Primary School, childcare and parks. Call today, inspection is an absolute must.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
Your Own Private Haven Amongst Nature!
If you're searching for a place to get away; your own private haven this is the perfect property for you. Close to Gembrook and all amenities, the property is set on a secluded beautiful 7 acres of stunning native bushland.
You will be charmed by the spacious home and tranquil setting with an abundance of bird and wildlife to observe from your balcony. The home offers space for the growing family both inside and out with 4 bedrooms with built in robes or 3 plus study, the Master with walk through robe and ensuite. Add to this 2 spacious living areas and huge family kitchen with loads of storage and access to the fantastic undercover entertaining deck, made perfect for year round entertaining with cafe blinds and beautiful outlook to the forest below. Features are many and include timber flooring, an extra-large wood heater, 10ft ceilings and split system cooling.
Outside the theme of large in size continues with an oversized double remote garage, 2 garden sheds and a 12 x 12m shed/workshop with concrete floor, power, wood heater, split system and toilet. If you are a cat lover your cat will love the under house run with various points of access to inside the home.
This wonderful lifestyle property is one you will be happy to come home to at the end of a stressful day, so book your private inspection today and experience it for yourself.
CALL TO ARRANGE A PRIVATE INSPECTION TODAY!
Aaron Day 0407 365 994 or Tyson Bluhm 0437 843 820

Description:
PRIVATE LOCATION.IN CENTRAL EMERALD
Secluded within a quiet leafy landscape on just over ½ acre is this immaculately present two bedroom home, located at the end of a no through road and yet only a very short stroll to the heart of Emerald, local schools, and public transport. The home features a light, bright and central kitchen with dishwasher and quality appliances, two good sized bedrooms with built in robes, modern family bathroom two toilets and a central living area. Extra features include ducted heating, split system, and ducted vacuum system. Outdoors you will find a lock up work shop, single carport, under house storage and a very private deck that overlooks a natural wonderland of native gardens, which are enjoyed by an abundance of native birds. Also included your very own stream! A very private oasis in central Emerald.

Description:
PRETTY AS A PICTURE
This lovely property is the epitome of living in the hills, quaintly tucked at the foothills of the Dandenong Ranges. The charming character filled home boasts space to move both inside and outside whilst being perfectly located in close proximity to Gembrooks lovely township where you will be delighted with the well serviced town including: supermarket, shops, cafes and eateries, Gembrook Primary School, Gembrook Sunday Market and to top it off there is Puffy Billys historic Railway Station just a hop, skip and jump away.
On entering the property, the manicured front gardens and beautiful outlook sets the scene for what is behind the closed gates. Meticulously maintained and immaculately presented the delightful family friendly home offers a versatile floorplan consisting of two generous living zones including front formal lounge and rumpus room complete with extensive storage cupboards with the light filled kitchen and dining sitting in the hub of the home boasting quality appliances. The bedroom accommodation has not been forgotten with four generous bedrooms, master with walk in robes, ensuite and doors leading to your own private garden space. The second bedroom is large enough to be used as a second master and all are completed with built ins.
Moving outdoors the appeal continues with the large double garage with additional workshop, there is a studio perfect for an office, art studio or even a teenagers bedroom fully powered plus internet access. The stunning manicured gardens are as pretty as a picture creating privacy, serenity and space for the kids to play. This can all be enjoyed from the newly completed undercover decked area 90m2 in size and perfect for entertaining and family fun.
Additional desired features to complete this lovely property include; cathedral ceilings, ducted heating, 2 x S/S, spa and double vanity to main bathroom, mains water & gas.
If you want the pleasure of calling this perfect picture your home then dont hesitate to call Jeanine on 0438 332 411.
Internal area
90m²

Description:
CLASSIC COUNTRY LIVING ON 1 ACRE WITH VIEWS
This stunning property ticks all of the boxes from the front to the back and is located on a sealed road within walking distance of the centre of Gembrook. A completely useable block with two road access and beautiful established gardens including a variety of fruit trees surrounds the large home that features 3 living areas, two bathrooms and zoned bedrooms to cater to a growing familys needs. Picture windows offer a sundrenched environment and allow a view of the garden and on to distant mountain ranges. The lounge room is a cosy place to relax and benefits from high ceilings and Baltic pine floors whilst the second living room features dado panelling, reverse cycle split system and a crackling solid fuel fire and is ideal as a kids playroom or family rumpus. There is also a dining room that leads off from the kitchen that has a gas heater. The country style kitchen has loads of cupboards, gas stove and dishwasher and will be a joy to cook up a storm in. The master bedroom has a wall of robes, split system and is set away from the remaining bedrooms allowing privacy for all. Alfresco dining will be a delight amongst a leafy setting and the balconies are a great place to sit with a drink and soak up the beauty that surrounds. To complete this ideal property, 10.4m X 7.5m double garage with power, concrete floor and workshop area will cater to your needs and there is fantastic access for an abundance of other toys including caravan, trailers etc. All of this within walking distance of child care, shops, school and kindergarten, make the right move today.
Due to strong market conditions, please call to ensure open for inspection is going ahead.

Description:
***CANCELLED - OPEN FOR INSPECTION - SATURDAY 2nd NOVEMBER - CANCELLED***
Situated in the heart of Emerald this great four bedroom home is perfect for those looking at moving from a large property to a central location without sacrificing on house size. Also ideally suited to young families who need to be able to walk to the Primary School, parks, shops and the kindergarten that is right across the road, this is a property that will make your life easier. A flat, fully fenced block with sealed driveway and colourful landscaped gardens surrounds this light filled brick home. There is a double remote garage under roofline with a rear roller door that allows access through to a separate Colorbond garage that has power and concrete floor. The design of the home offers zoned bedrooms and living areas making for easy living whatever the size of your family. The master bedroom is serviced by a full ensuite and walk in robe and the remaining bedrooms have their own section and are serviced by the family bathroom. Two spacious living areas at either end of the home provide for relaxed living and the central kitchen with loads of bench space and cupboards, dishwasher, wall oven and hotplates has a large tiled meals area adjoining with a sliding door out to the covered outdoor area. Gas ducted heating, split system and shade blinds ensure year round comfort. Walk to any of our highly regarded eateries and relax with a latte, wander down to the park and wave to Puffing Billy or get involved in the nearby Art Society or Gemco theatre. If you have been waiting for the ideal home in a central location, this is the home for you.
